methods.name: <init>

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree where the fragment will reside

params.name: parentName
params.comment: name of the module that is the parent of the fragment

methods.name: applyTo
methods.comment:
Apply the command; if the name already exists, then the fragment 
 will not be created.

return.comment: false if the fragment was not created
